author: A_Brickset_user
title: Good Lego Technic Set
review: I like this set quite a lot. It has some nice Lego Technic parts(like threads) to it as well as cool minifigure (which Lego does not make anymore for some reason). This set has a good playability, since the main model can seperate into two parts: bottom part with threads that acts as some kind of tractor and top part that can act as some kind of flyer. This model can also be rebuilt into a forklift that can be motorized. Unfortunatly, forklift does not move very well when motorized. This set is a great addition to any Technic collection. 5/5

author: NightCabbage
title: Great Set
review:
I really liked this set! :)


I'm the kind of person who loves things that do something - transform, detach, move, shoot, etc. And this set did something cool! The top "flying craft" can detach form the bottom "track vehicle" via a little locking mechanism - it works very well!


It's solid, so it will never fall apart by itself - yet easy to detach via the mechanism. Also, the cockpit opens via a cog mechanism, pretty good too.


I was very happy with this set, especially given it was reasonably priced! :)
